name: tpp.vim
summary: Syntax highlighting for tpp presentation files
description: TPP (http://synflood.at/tpp/) is a presentation tool for the Linux/Unix commandline.
install_details: Installation details in English and German can be found at http://www.technixen.net/modules.php?op=modload&name=Downloads&file=index&req=viewdownloaddetails&lid=7&ttitle=tpp.vim
